name: Wilt
text: Give to the Groot player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Wilt from the game. - Remove 3 growth counters from Groot. If no growth counters were removed this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Furnax rampage across Groot's homeworld, Planet X, bringing death and destruction to everything it touches.
name: Blazing Inferno
text: Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, deal 2 indirect damage to each player.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Furnax activates, deal 2 indirect damage to each player.
name: Furnax
Fan the Flames
text: When revealed: Take 2 indirect damage. If Blazing Inferno is in play, take 1 additional indirect damage. If Furnax is in play, take 1 additional indirect damage.

name: Crisis on Halfworld
text: Give to the Rocket Raccoon player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Crisis on Halfworld from the game. - Discard the highest cost upgrade you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation

flavor: "I know you hate that word. But hey, if it looks like a duck, quacks like a duck, and walks like a duck... it's a raccoon!" - Blackjack O'Hare
name: Vendetta
Blackjack O'Hare
text: Quickstrike. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) (Rocket Raccoon's nemesis minion.)

name: Blackjack's Bazooka
text: Attach to Blackjack O'Hare, if able. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Hero Action: Spend [mental][mental][mental] resources → Discard this card.

flavor: "What're you gonna ado about it?!" - Blackjack O'Hare
name: Planetary Invasion
text: When revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Reveal that minion, then give it a tough status card.
